name: Magicians In Brazil
description:
Wanting to take an environmentalist approach to the topic of a game, I looked to the increasing rates of deforestation in the Amazon rainforest, especially in Brazil under the power of Jair Bolsonaro. 

In need of a sense of community, you play as a magician in Brazil who is seeking to build a resort for magicians-- by magicians. To facilitate their favorite pastime, they fireball their newfound section of the rainforest to collect wood and expand this new resort. Once you reach eight magicians, that is what they call a Full House. Have fun and make friends along the way! 

(left click to shoot)
